dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') sys_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:SAIL_DATE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YYYY') date_st, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:SAIL_DATE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YYYY') date_end FROM DUAL

SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(atr.object_gid) booking_id, did.column_name, di.pk_value, TRIM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100) = atr.object_gid THEN DECODE(UPPER(did.column_name),'ARRIVALDATE','ARRIVAL_DATE','DEPARTUREDATE','DEPARTURE_DATE','ACTUALARRIVALDATE', 'ACTUAL_ARRIVAL_DATE','ACTUALDEPARTUREDATE','ACTUAL_DEPARTURE_DATE','SOURCELOCATIONGID','SOURCE_LOCATION_GID', 'DESTLOCATIONGID','DEST_LOCATION_GID','UNITNETWEIGHT','UNIT_WEIGHT','VOYAGENAME','VOYAGE_NAME', 'CAPACITYCOMMITTIME','CAPACITY_COMMIT_TIME','BOOKINGFREEZETIME','BOOKING_FREEZE_TIME',UPPER(did.column_name)) ELSE DECODE((CASE WHEN UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100)) = di.pk_value THEN UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,' ',1,1)+1,100)) ELSE UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100)) END),'CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME','DOC CUTOFF DATE',(CASE WHEN UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100)) = di.pk_value THEN UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,' ',1,1)+1,100)) ELSE UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100)) END)) END) field_name, did.before_value, did.after_value, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(atr.audit_time AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') audit_date, glog_util.remove_domain(atr.gl_user_gid) audit_user FROM (SELECT DISTINCT cv.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage cv WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND ((TO_DATE(:SAIL_DATE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(:SAIL_DATE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= 180)) AND (TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'DD-MM-RR') >= TO_DATE(:SAIL_DATE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.departure_date,'DD-MM-RR') <= TO_DATE(:SAIL_DATE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:ETA_DATE_START IS NULL OR (NOT :ETA_DATE_START IS NULL AND (TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'DD-MM-RR') >= TO_DATE(:ETA_DATE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cv.arrival_date,'DD-MM-RR') <= (CASE WHEN :ETA_DATE_END IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(:ETA_DATE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_DATE(:ETA_DATE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') END)))) AND (:CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID IS NULL OR (NOT :CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID IS NULL AND cv.charter_voyage_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:CHARTER_VOYAGE_GID, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL))) AND (:SERVPROV_GID IS NULL OR (NOT :SERVPROV_GID IS NULL AND cv.servprov_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:SERVPROV_GID,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:SERVPROV_GID, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL))) AND (:IS_CANCELLED = 'BOTH' OR cv.is_cancelled = :IS_CANCELLED) AND (:VESSEL_NAME IS NULL OR (NOT :VESSEL_NAME IS NULL AND cv.voyage_name LIKE '%' || :VESSEL_NAME || '%')) AND (:VOYAGE_NUMBER IS NULL OR (NOT :VOYAGE_NUMBER IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value LIKE '%' || :VOYAGE_NUMBER || '%'))) AND (:RAMP_CUTOFF_START IS NULL OR (NOT :RAMP_CUTOFF_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START RAMP CUTOFF TIME' AND (TO_DATE(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'MM/DD/YY') >= TO_DATE(:RAMP_CUTOFF_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'MM/DD/YY') <= (CASE WHEN :RAMP_CUTOFF_END IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(:RAMP_CUTOFF_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_DATE(:RAMP_CUTOFF_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') END))))) AND (:DOC_CUTOFF_START IS NULL OR (NOT :DOC_CUTOFF_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_DOC CLOSING TIME' AND (TO_DATE(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'MM/DD/YY') >= TO_DATE(:DOC_CUTOFF_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'MM/DD/YY') <= (CASE WHEN :DOC_CUTOFF_END IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(:DOC_CUTOFF_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_DATE(:DOC_CUTOFF_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') END))))) AND (:PORT_CUTOFF_START IS NULL OR (NOT :PORT_CUTOFF_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_START PORT CUTOFF TIME' AND (TO_DATE(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'MM/DD/YY') >= TO_DATE(:PORT_CUTOFF_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value,'MM/DD/YY') <= (CASE WHEN :PORT_CUTOFF_END IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(:PORT_CUTOFF_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_DATE(:PORT_CUTOFF_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') END))))) AND (:SOURCE_LOCATION IS NULL OR (NOT :SOURCE_LOCATION IS NULL AND cv.source_location_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:SOURCE_LOCATION,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:SOURCE_LOCATION, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL))) AND (:DEST_LOCATION IS NULL OR (NOT :DEST_LOCATION IS NULL AND cv.dest_location_gid IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:DEST_LOCATION,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:DEST_LOCATION, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL))) AND (:LOC_CODE IS NULL OR (NOT :LOC_CODE IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE))) AND (:LOAD_PORT IS NULL OR (NOT :LOAD_PORT IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/%.VIA_LOCATION_ID' AND 'SCOULAR.' || cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:LOAD_PORT,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:LOAD_PORT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)))) AND (:DISCHARGE_PORT IS NULL OR (NOT :DISCHARGE_PORT IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE' AND 'SCOULAR.' || cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:DISCHARGE_PORT,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:DISCHARGE_PORT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)))) AND (:TRANSHIP_PORT IS NULL OR (NOT :TRANSHIP_PORT IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT' AND 'SCOULAR.' || cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(:TRANSHIP_PORT,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) items FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(:TRANSHIP_PORT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)))) AND (:COUNT_TEU_START IS NULL OR (NOT :COUNT_TEU_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TEU COUNT' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_TEU_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :COUNT_TEU_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_TEU_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_TEU_END) END))))) AND (:COUNT_FORTY_START IS NULL OR (NOT :COUNT_FORTY_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_40FT COUNT' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTY_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :COUNT_FORTY_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTY_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTY_END) END))))) AND (:COUNT_FORTYRF_START IS NULL OR (NOT :COUNT_FORTYRF_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_40FTRF COUNT' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYRF_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :COUNT_FORTYRF_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYRF_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYRF_END) END))))) AND (:COUNT_FORTYHC_START IS NULL OR (NOT :COUNT_FORTYHC_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_40FTHC COUNT' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYHC_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :COUNT_FORTYHC_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYHC_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYHC_END) END))))) AND (:COUNT_FORTYFIVE_START IS NULL OR (NOT :COUNT_FORTYFIVE_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_45FT COUNT' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYFIVE_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :COUNT_FORTYFIVE_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYFIVE_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_FORTYFIVE_END) END))))) AND (:COUNT_TWENTYRF_START IS NULL OR (NOT :COUNT_TWENTYRF_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_20FTRF COUNT' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_TWENTYRF_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :COUNT_TWENTYRF_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_TWENTYRF_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:COUNT_TWENTYRF_END) END))))) AND (:TEU_SYSTEM_START IS NULL OR (NOT :TEU_SYSTEM_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TEU_COST_SYSTEM' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:TEU_SYSTEM_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :TEU_SYSTEM_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:TEU_SYSTEM_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:TEU_SYSTEM_END) END))))) AND (:TEU_USER_START IS NULL OR (NOT :TEU_USER_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TEU_COST_USER' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:TEU_USER_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :TEU_USER_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:TEU_USER_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:TEU_USER_END) END))))) AND (:FEU_SYSTEM_START IS NULL OR (NOT :FEU_SYSTEM_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.FEU_COST_SYSTEM' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:FEU_SYSTEM_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :FEU_SYSTEM_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:FEU_SYSTEM_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:FEU_SYSTEM_END) END))))) AND (:FEU_USER_START IS NULL OR (NOT :FEU_USER_START IS NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT cref.charter_voyage_gid FROM charter_voyage_refnum cref WHERE cref.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid AND cref.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.FEU_COST_USER' AND (TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) >= TO_NUMBER(:FEU_USER_START) AND TO_NUMBER(cref.charter_voyage_refnum_value) <= (CASE WHEN :FEU_USER_END IS NULL THEN TO_NUMBER(:FEU_USER_START) ELSE TO_NUMBER(:FEU_USER_END) END))))) ) a INNER JOIN audit_trail atr ON a.charter_voyage_gid = atr.object_gid AND atr.audit_object_type_gid = 'CHARTER_VOYAGE' INNER JOIN audit_data_info adi ON atr.audit_trail_gid = adi.audit_trail_gid INNER JOIN data_info di ON adi.data_info_seq = di.data_info_seq INNER JOIN data_info_detail did ON di.data_info_seq = did.data_info_seq WHERE NOT did.column_name = 'UNKNOWN' AND (:AUDIT_START IS NULL OR (NOT :AUDIT_START IS NULL AND TO_DATE(atr.audit_time,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:AUDIT_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(atr.audit_time,'dd-mm-rr') <= (CASE WHEN :AUDIT_END IS NULL THEN TO_DATE(:AUDIT_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_DATE(:AUDIT_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') END))) AND ((:AUDIT_FIELD = 'ALL' OR (NOT :AUDIT_FIELD = 'ALL' AND NOT INSTR(:AUDIT_FIELD,'|') > 0 AND TRIM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100) = atr.object_gid THEN DECODE(UPPER(did.column_name),'ARRIVALDATE','ARRIVAL_DATE','DEPARTUREDATE','DEPARTURE_DATE','ACTUALARRIVALDATE', 'ACTUAL_ARRIVAL_DATE','ACTUALDEPARTUREDATE','ACTUAL_DEPARTURE_DATE','SOURCELOCATIONGID','SOURCE_LOCATION_GID', 'DESTLOCATIONGID','DEST_LOCATION_GID','UNITNETWEIGHT','UNIT_WEIGHT','VOYAGENAME','VOYAGE_NAME', 'CAPACITYCOMMITTIME','CAPACITY_COMMIT_TIME','BOOKINGFREEZETIME','BOOKING_FREEZE_TIME',UPPER(did.column_name)) ELSE (CASE WHEN UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100)) = di.pk_value THEN UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,' ',1,1)+1,100)) ELSE UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100)) END) END) = :AUDIT_FIELD)) OR (:AUDIT_FIELD = 'ALL' OR (NOT :AUDIT_FIELD = 'ALL' AND INSTR(:AUDIT_FIELD,'|') > 0 AND TRIM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100) = atr.object_gid THEN UPPER(did.column_name) ELSE (CASE WHEN UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100)) = di.pk_value THEN UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,' ',1,1)+1,100)) ELSE UPPER(SUBSTR(di.pk_value,INSTR(di.pk_value,'.',1,2)+1,100)) END) END) LIKE REPLACE(:AUDIT_FIELD,'|','%')))) ORDER BY atr.object_gid, atr.audit_time

SELECT (CASE WHEN TO_DATE(:SAIL_DATE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(:SAIL_DATE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= 180 THEN 'Sail Date Range must be less than or equal to 180 days - please choose a lesser date range' ELSE '' END) error_message FROM DUAL
